content: NEW YORK/HOUSTON PBF Energy has turned to Iraq to help replace Venezuelan barrels at its East Coast refineries after suspending direct purchases of heavy oil from Venezuela's PDVSA amid U.S. sanctions  according to Thomson Reuters Eikon data.
name: PBF Energy Inc
title: Iraq emerges as early winner in U.S.-Venezuela oil dispute

content: HOUSTON PBF Energy was restarting its 190 000 barrel-per-day (bpd) Chalmette  Louisiana  refinery on Sunday after it was knocked out of production by a morning power outage  said sources familiar with plant operations.
name: PBF Energy Inc
title: PBF Chalmette refinery restarting after power outage: sources

content: HOUSTON The fifth largest U.S. buyer of Venezuelan crude  PBF Energy Inc  has halted direct purchases from state-run oil company PDVSA  according to four sources  deepening a rift amid sanctions on the OPEC-member country.
name: PBF Energy Inc
title: Exclusive: PBF's split with PDVSA grows as U.S. refiner halts direct deals

content: By Alexandra Ulmer and Marianna Parraga     CARACAS/HOUSTON  Aug 30 U.S. sanctions on the finance boss of Venezuela's oil company PDVSA have led to some exports to the United States being blocked as banks and investment funds refuse to provide letters of credit to potential buyers  three financial sources said.     U.S. businesses are barred from dealing with a sanctioned person or company and one of the sources said the sanctions on PDVSA's Finance Vice President Simon Zerpa wer
name: PBF Energy Inc
title: U.S. sanctions on Venezuela oil company CFO tangle financial deals -sources

content: CARACAS  Aug 18 A U.S.-led "blockade" has hurt Venezuelan state oil company PDVSA's capacity to undertake routine financial transactions  and forced it to rely on political allies like China and Russia  the company's president said on Friday.
name: PBF Energy Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Venezuelan oil company PDVSA blasts 'financial blockade'

content: Oct 1 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2000 GMT on Thursday:
name: PBF Energy Inc
title: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions

content: PBF Energy Inc  agreed to buy Exxon Mobil Corp's  refinery in Torrance  California  for $537.5 million  completing Executive Chairman Tom O'Malley's vision to have PBF plants coast to coast.
name: PBF Energy Inc
title: PBF Energy buys Torrance refinery in bid for national footprint

content: HOUSTON  Oct 1 PBF Energy Inc's purchase of Exxon Mobil Corp's California refinery marks Chairman Tom O'Malley's biggest bet yet on U.S. refining in the country's toughest market.
name: PBF Energy Inc
title: RPT-California could be PBF's biggest refinery challenge yet

name: PBF Energy Inc
title: PBF Energy to buy Exxon Mobil's Torrance refinery

content: HOUSTON  Sept 14 PBF Energy Inc plans to restart a 20 000 barrel-per-day (bpd) hydrocracking unit  perhaps as early as late 2016  at the 192 500-bpd refinery in Chalmette  Louisiana  of which the company is scheduled to take possession by the end of this year  said sources familiar with PBF's plans.
name: PBF Energy Inc
title: UPDATE 1-PBF planning to restart Chalmette refinery hydrocracker -sources

content: NEW YORK  Aug 24 A key gasoline-making unit at PBF Energy Inc's 182 200-barrel-per-day (bpd) Delaware City  Delaware  refinery is expected to be shut for at least a month - and possibly much longer - following an explosion and fire on Friday  a source familiar with plant operations said on Sunday.
name: PBF Energy Inc
title: PBF's Delaware City catalytic cracker shut for at least a month -source

content: NEW YORK U.S. oil refiner PBF Energy Inc is shipping a cargo of crude from Western Canada to supply its plant on the other side of the continent  a rare move traders say is a sign steep discounts for oil sands are upending age-old trade routes.
name: PBF Energy Inc
title: In rare move  PBF snaps up oil cargo from Western Canada

content: June 18 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2000 GMT on Thursday:

content: June 18 PBF Energy Inc agreed to buy the 189 000 barrel-a-day Chalmette  Louisiana  refinery for $322 million from Exxon Mobil Corp and Petroleos de Venezuela SA  marking the New Jersey-based company's Gulf Coast debut.
name: PBF Energy Inc
title: UPDATE 3-PBF Energy to buy Chalmette refinery from Exxon  PDVSA

content: June 18 PBF Energy Inc said it will buy the 189 000-barrel-per-day Chalmette oil refinery in Louisiana and related assets from Exxon Mobil Corp and Venezuela's national oil company  Petroleos de Venezuela SA (PDVSA)  for $322 million.
name: PBF Energy Inc
title: PBF Energy to buy Chalmette refinery from Exxon and PDVSA

content: NEW YORK  June 3 PBF Energy has extended its offtake agreement at its East Coast refineries with the commodity trading arm of Goldman Sachs  the company disclosed in a federal filing Wednesday.
name: PBF Energy Inc
title: PBF extends offtake accord with Goldman at East Coast refineries

content: NEW YORK  April 30 PBF Energy executives said on Thursday they have yet to deliver on plans to grow the company through acquisitions but remained hopeful.
name: PBF Energy Inc
title: UPDATE 1-PBF Energy hopeful on acquisitions  keen on West Coast refineries

content: NEW YORK PBF Energy  executives said on Thursday they have yet to deliver on plans to grow the company through acquisitions but remained hopeful.

content: NEW YORK  Feb 12 PBF Energy Inc's three refineries will not be affected by the strike by United Steelworkers union workers currently impacting 11 plants  the company said during a conference call with analysts on Thursday.

title: PBF Energy says its refineries will not be affected by strike
